mapper.select:
select t.parent_id,t.parent_name,t.idcard,t.parent_tel,t.PARENT_NAME_SECOND, t.ID_CARD_TYPE, t.ID_CARD_TYPE_SECOND, t.IDCARD_SECOND, t.PARENT_TEL_SECOND, FUNC_GET_TABLEVALUE(t1.student_id,'T_XG_STUDENT','STUDENT_ID','NAME') studentName, FUNC_GET_USERDICVALUE(t.id_card_type,'JZZJLX') idCardTypeShow, FUNC_GET_USERDICVALUE(t.id_card_type_second,'JZZJLX') idCardTypeSecondShow, t1.student_id, t2.HOUSEHOLD_REGISTER_PLACE from T_XG_PARENT t,T_XG_PARENT_STUDENT t1,T_XG_STUDENT t2 WHERE 1 = 1 and t.PARENT_ID = t1.PARENT_ID and t1.student_id = t2.student_id
AND t.parent_name LIKE '%${parentName}%'
AND t.PARENT_NAME_SECOND LIKE '%${parentNameSecond}%'

select t.parent_id,t.parent_name,t.idcard,t.parent_tel,t.PARENT_NAME_SECOND, t.ID_CARD_TYPE, t.ID_CARD_TYPE_SECOND, t.IDCARD_SECOND, t.PARENT_TEL_SECOND, FUNC_GET_TABLEVALUE(t1.student_id,'T_XG_STUDENT','STUDENT_ID','NAME') studentName, FUNC_GET_USERDICVALUE(t.id_card_type,'JZZJLX') idCardTypeShow, FUNC_GET_USERDICVALUE(t.id_card_type_second,'JZZJLX') idCardTypeSecondShow, t1.student_id, t2.HOUSEHOLD_REGISTER_PLACE from T_XG_PARENT t,T_XG_PARENT_STUDENT t1,T_XG_STUDENT t2 WHERE 1 = 1 and t.PARENT_ID = t1.PARENT_ID and t1.student_id = t2.student_id and t.parent_id = #{id}
mapper.update: update t_xg_parent set parent_name=#{parentName}, idcard = #{idcard}, parent_tel=#{parentTel}, parent_name_second = #{parentNameSecond}, id_card_type = #{idCardType}, id_card_type_second = #{idCardTypeSecond}, idcard_second = #{idcardSecond}, parent_tel_second = #{parentTelSecond}, changer=#{changer},change_time=sysdate,change_dept=#{changeDept} where parent_id = #{parentId}
mapper.select: select count(USER_ID) as count from T_SYS_USER t where USER_ID = #{idcard}

SELECT id,name,pid,checked1 as checked FROM ( SELECT t.dept_id id , t.dept_name name,t.parent_dept_id pId,0 checked1 FROM T_SYS_DEPT t WHERE t.dept_type < 9 UNION ALL SELECT d.major_code id, d.major_name || ' -- '|| FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(d.training_level, 'ZXZYPYCC') name ,d.departments_id pId,0 checked1 FROM T_XG_MAJOR d WHERE d.valid_flag =1 UNION ALL SELECT e.class_id id,e.class_name name ,e.major_code pId,0 checked1 FROM T_XG_CLASS e WHERE e.valid_flag =1 UNION ALL( select s.id , s.name , s.pId , nvl2(rol.id,1,0) as checked1 from (select s.student_id, s.name||' 家长' name , rela.class_id pId, re.parent_id||','||s.student_id as id ,re.parent_id parentId from t_xg_parent_student re , t_xg_student s ,T_XG_STUDENT_CLASS rela where s.student_id = re.student_id and s.student_id = rela.student_id ) s Left JOIN T_XG_PARENT_STUDENT_ROLE rol on rol.student_id = s.student_id and rol.parent_id = s.parentId and rol.role_id = #{roleId} ) )

SELECT array.array_id,array.arrayclass_id, array.class_id, FUNC_GET_TABLEVALUE(array.class_id, 'T_XG_CLASS', 'CLASS_ID', 'CLASS_NAME') as className, array.course_id, FUNC_GET_TABLEVALUE(array.COURSE_ID, 'T_JW_COURSE', 'COURSE_ID', 'COURSE_NAME') courseShow , array.teacher_person_id teacherPersonId,array.teacher_dept_id teacherDeptId, FUNC_GET_USERNAME(array.teacher_person_id) teacherPersonName , arrClass.arrayclass_name arrayClassName, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(arrClass.term, 'XQ') termShow, term FROM T_JW_ARRAYCLASS_ARRAY array , t_jw_arrayclass arrClass WHERE 1 = 1 and array.arrayclass_id = arrClass.Arrayclass_Id AND array.class_id in
''||'${item}'||''
and arrClass.ARRAYCLASS_FLAG= '1'

SELECT array.array_id,array.arrayclass_id, array.class_id, FUNC_GET_TABLEVALUE(array.class_id, 'T_XG_CLASS', 'CLASS_ID', 'CLASS_NAME') as className, array.course_id, FUNC_GET_TABLEVALUE(array.COURSE_ID, 'T_JW_COURSE', 'COURSE_ID', 'COURSE_NAME') courseShow , array.teacher_person_id teacherPersonId, FUNC_GET_USERNAME(array.teacher_person_id) teacherPersonName , arrClass.arrayclass_name arrayClassName, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(arrClass.term, 'XQ') termShow, term FROM T_JW_ARRAYCLASS_ARRAY array , t_jw_arrayclass arrClass WHERE 1 = 1 and array.teacher_person_id = #{teacherId} and array.arrayclass_id = arrClass.Arrayclass_Id and arrClass.ARRAYCLASS_FLAG= '1'

SELECT t.dept_id id , t.dept_name name,t.parent_dept_id pid,0 checked FROM T_SYS_DEPT t WHERE t.dept_type < 9 UNION ALL SELECT d.major_code id, d.major_name || ' -- '|| FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(d.training_level, 'ZXZYPYCC') name ,d.departments_id pid,0 checked FROM T_XG_MAJOR d WHERE d.valid_flag =1 UNION ALL SELECT e.class_id id,e.class_name name ,e.major_code pid,0 checked FROM T_XG_CLASS e WHERE e.valid_flag =1 UNION ALL( select s.id, s.name, s.pid, nvl2(p.id, 1, 0) as checked from (select s.student_id, s.name || ' 家长' name, rela.class_id pid, re.parent_id || ',' || s.student_id as id, re.parent_id parentId from t_xg_parent_student re, t_xg_student s, T_XG_STUDENT_CLASS rela where s.student_id = re.student_id and s.student_id = rela.student_id) s Left JOIN T_DC_PERSON p on p.PERSON_DEPT = s.student_id and p.PERSON_TYPE = '3' and p.PERSON_ID = s.parentId and p.SURVEY_ID = #{surveyId} )

SELECT t.dept_id id , t.dept_name name,t.parent_dept_id pid,0 checked FROM T_SYS_DEPT t WHERE VALID_FLAG = '1' UNION ALL SELECT s.person_id || ',' || s.dept_id as id, s.name, s.dept_id as pid, nvl2(p.id, 1, 0) as checked FROM (SELECT e.name , e.person_id , d.dept_id FROM T_RS_EMPLOYEE e , T_RS_EMPLOYEE_DEPT d WHERE e.person_id = d.person_id AND e.valid_flag ='1' ) s Left JOIN T_DC_PERSON p ON p.PERSON_DEPT = s.dept_id AND p.PERSON_TYPE = '1' AND p.PERSON_ID = s.person_id AND p.SURVEY_ID = #{surveyId}

SELECT t.dept_id id , t.dept_name name,t.parent_dept_id pid,0 checked FROM T_SYS_DEPT t WHERE t.dept_type < 9 UNION ALL SELECT d.major_code id, d.major_name || ' -- '|| FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(d.training_level, 'ZXZYPYCC') name ,d.departments_id pid,0 checked FROM T_XG_MAJOR d WHERE d.valid_flag =1 UNION ALL SELECT e.class_id id,e.class_name name ,e.major_code pid,0 checked FROM T_XG_CLASS e WHERE e.valid_flag =1 UNION ALL( select s.id, s.name, s.pid, nvl2(p.id, 1, 0) as checked from (select s.student_id, s.name name, rela.class_id pid, rela.class_id|| ',' ||s.student_id as id from t_xg_student s, T_XG_STUDENT_CLASS rela where s.student_id = rela.student_id) s Left JOIN T_DC_PERSON p on p.PERSON_DEPT = s.pid and p.PERSON_TYPE = '2' and p.person_id = s.student_id and p.SURVEY_ID = #{surveyId} )
